R380 - discovered directory structure.
======================================

All the following filenames and directory names where taken from a log file generated during a backup of the R380.

C drive contents:
-----------------

c:\system\
	APPS\
		ADRBOOK\
			adrbook.ini
		CALC\
			Calc.ini
		CALENDAR\
			calendar.ini
		GAME\
			
		MESSAGING\
			messaging.ini
		NOTEPAD\
			notepad.ini
		OSMAN\
		PASSWORDS\
		TELE\
			Voices.ini
			CallSummary.ini
			CallLog.ini
			AudioEngine.ini
		WAPBROWSER\
			WAPConfig.cfg
			Bookmarks.dat
			History.dat
			Cache		
	WCLOCK\
		wclock.ini
	DATA\
		commsdbu.dat
		Contacts.cdb
		Mru.dat
		MachConf.ini
		Game.ini
		Almsvr.dat
		version.ini
		locale.ini
		versionz.ini
		language.ver
		HWSERVER.INI
		osman_prevent_erase.ini
		osman_first_run.ini
		Roxsetts.ini
		Osman.ini
		pcSync.ini
		eiksvrox_prevent_format.ini
		eiksvrox_first_run.ini
		slopfile
		Eiksvrox.ini 
	libs\
	System.ini
	Mtm\
		MtmRegistry (might be two words)
	Mail\
		Index
		00001001_S	//This dir contains the SMS files.
			00001002
			00001003
			00001004
			00001005
			00001006
			00100017
			00100018 
			00100019
			0010001A
			0010001B
			0010001C
			0010001D
			0010001E
			0010001F
			00100020
			00100021
			00100022
			00100023
			00100024
			00100025
			00100026
		00001001
		00100000_S
		00100000
		00100001_S
		00100001
		00100002_S
		00100002
		00001000

	epoccont.ini

c:\documents
	notepad
	MESSAGING
	WCLOCK
	agenda
	CALENDAR

Z drive contents:
-----------------

Z:\SYSTEM\
	LIBS\
		PCS.RSY
		gencserv.RSY
